tool_description: This api sends instant mail from webapps directly to clients. It works well in both development and production (regardless of the hosting service). Check the about page for more info.
name: Mail man
title: Mail man

api_list.name: Send Mail
api_list.description: Send instant email to clients from webapps
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mail-man.p.rapidapi.com/mail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mail-man.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mail-man.p.rapidapi.com/mail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mail-man.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
